topic.title: Supported Platforms
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server is supported on numerous popular operating systems and virtual environments. All options listed below are 64-bit compatible.

table.title: Supported Operating Systems for Development, Testing, and Production

entry.p: Certified 2016 Standard; Supported with monthly rollups
Certified 2012 R2 Standard; Supported with monthly rollups

table.title: Supported Operating Systems for Development and Testing

body.p: Certified: Certified means that on this OS version, Couchbase Server has passed our extensive testing and review process to make sure it runs well out of the box.

Supported: Supported means that on this OS version, we believe that Couchbase Server will run well out of the box but extensive testing has not been carried out with that OS version. We will make our best effort to investigate the issue on a compatible OS version, but recommend you run Couchbase on the certified OS version.
* Only the Red Hat Compatible Kernel (RHCK) is supported, the Unbreakable Enterprise Kernel is not a supported platform.
** Amazon Linux only supported when run using the official Couchbase Server AMI on AWS.
